data.title: Julia Cameron – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Julia Cameron. Browse Julia Cameron’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
The Artist's Way: 25th Anniversary Edition

By: Julia Cameron

Narrated by: Eliza Foss

Length: 10 hrs and 15 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 372

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 272

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 269

The Artist’s Way is the seminal book on the subject of creativity. In this edition, Julia Cameron reflects upon the impact of The Artist’s Way and describes the work she has done during the last decade and the new insights into the creative process that she has gained....

2 out of 5 stars

Waste of a credit

By SWilly on 01-04-22

It's Never Too Late to Begin Again: Discovering Creativity and Meaning at Midlife and Beyond

Artist's Way

By: Julia Cameron, Emma Lively

Narrated by: Heather Henderson

Length: 10 hrs and 47 mins

Unabridged

Overall

4.5 out of 5 stars 112

Performance

4.5 out of 5 stars 85

Story

4.5 out of 5 stars 81

Julia Cameron tells listeners that retirement can, in fact, be the most rich, fulfilling, and creative time of their lives. This fun, gentle, step-by-step process will help you explore your creative dreams, wishes, and desires and help you quickly find that it’s never too late to begin again....

5 out of 5 stars

Narrator excels as does the book

By Carl G on 09-24-18

1 out of 5 stars

I wish there was a zero star rating

By Jason on 04-24-07

Author Julia Cameron changed the way the world thinks about creativity when she first published The Artist’s Way: A Spiritual Path to Higher Creativity 30 years ago. Over five million copies later, Cameron now turns her attention to creative prayer....
